channel.title: Does anyone need a Dynamic Signature for a specific game?
channel.description:
Does anyone need a Dynamic Signature for a specific game?
I have been working on a RuneScape dynamic sig for some time and it was a lot of work. The base is completely set for anyone who wants to use it, so I figure I could work on another website to create another stat signature. :)
Do you know of any games that are very popular that display statistics on a webpage? If you do, please post and I'll try to create a dynamic sig for it. :D
~Ron

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Ron:

OK cool thanks guys. Now I just need to code it which won’t take too long and a Graphics Master to make the background and/or make a killer font to make the stat sig look really nice.

Erm, post in the Graphic request/help section, I’m sure there are plenty of people willing to help.

item.title: Does anyone need a Dynamic Signature for a specific game?
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

GunZ does this, theres a high score page for clans and individual ranking. Somebody there is making signatures for people, but all they do is pick up your stats from the high scores and paste them on the signature, you could revolutionize that.
